short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A customizable new tab extension for Chromium browsers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Minitime is a Chromium-based browser extension for minimal and customizable new tabs. 

Almost every element on the page is customizable and you can hide them completely if you wish. On the new tab page, Minitime shows, time date, calendar with three months preview, weather, motivational quotes and most visited sites. 

You can freely change the background image at any time with customizable topic. Background refreshes itself daily and weather refreshes itself hourly. For the ones who do not like image backgrounds, the background can be set to dark. 

Weather, date and calendar came in 5 different languages: English, French, Turkish, Spanish, and German. Different date formats or fonts can be selected. 

Minitime does not collect any data.
